configuration.groups:
OESS
[% FOREACH interface IN endpoints %]
[% interface.interface %]
[% interface.unit %]
[% END %]
[%- FOREACH interface IN endpoints -%] [%- IF interface.bandwidth > 0 %]
[% interface.interface %]
[% interface.unit %]
[%- END -%] [%- END %]
OESS-L2CCC-[% a_side %]-[% dest_node %]-LSP-[% circuit_id %]
[% FOREACH path IN paths %]
OESS-L2CCC-[% a_side %]-[% dest_node %]-LSP-[% circuit_id %]-[% path.name %]
[% END %]
OESS-L2CCC-[% circuit_id %]
